sqlitedatabases

Class UsersDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • sqlitedatabases.SQLiteDatabase
      • sqlitedatabases.UsersDatabase

  • public class UsersDatabase
extends SQLiteDatabase
    Sets up SQLite database 'users' with columns: userID, userName, password, role. Deals with all communications to this database.
    Author:
    Sam
